author: markrmiller
msg: more refactoring for solrj and add missing license headers

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented a system for dynamically building and deploying Features; this uses the same approach as the Widgets build system, but also compiles the Feature core java classes and deploys them as part of the built codebase. The Bondi Camera API feature is provided as an example feature. See WOOKIE-99 for more information.

author: mir
msg: CLEREZZA-129: created issue. org.apache.clerezza.triaxrs: resource and resource method paths have to be encoded.
